page.title: 07BERWICK SCHOOLS
page.content:
In the table below,column A is number of teachers,B is number of pupils,C is boys,D is girls and E is the year when the building was opened. SCHOOL HEADMASTER A B C D E Tweed- Mr.Johnston 7 146 84 62 1906 mth-west Prior Mr.Maddocks 10 235 110 125 1970 Park St.Cuth- Mr.Smith 61 34 27 1934 bert's RC Parade Mr.Gedling 5 143 87 56 1835 CE Berwick Mr.Cooper 23 438 238 200 1927 middle Tweed- Mr.Holmes 24 480 250 232 1937 mth middle Berwick Mr.Conway 65 994 519 475 1958 High
The three-tier system was introduced in the area in 1975/6.
